title: 这样设置主城永久都是白天！！

replies.author: 筒子
replies.txt_content:
先把时间调成白天

/gamerule doDaylightCycle false   冻结时间

replies.author: 会飞的小面
replies.txt_content:
首先/time set 100
然后/gamerule doDaylightCycle flase

replies.author: 晓　晨　灬
replies.txt_content: 第一/time set 100 第二/mv gamerule doDaylightCycle false
